questions.question: Which logic gate can be used to implement a half-adder?

explanations.a: Incorrect. An AND gate alone cannot implement a half-adder.
explanations.b: Incorrect. An OR gate alone cannot implement a half-adder.
explanations.c: Correct! XOR gate is used to get sum bit in a half-adder.
explanations.d: Incorrect. A NOT gate alone cannot implement a half-adder.
